name: Transport, ocean freighter, average fuel mix
description: This cradle-to-gate unit process is for the transport of 1 tonne of freight 1 kilometer via an ocean freighter. This dataset represents an average ocean freighter fuel mix of 80% residual fuel oil and 20% diesel.
category: 48-49: Transportation and Warehousing/4831: Deep Sea, Coastal, and Great Lakes Water Transportation

processDocumentation.timeDescription: This unit process is representative of a fuel mix from a 2023 report.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: This process is representative of a global ocean freighter fuel mix.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Residual fuel oil is the most commonly used fuel for cargo ships, making up 80% of fuel use. Diesel and other fuel sources account for the remaining 20% of cargo ships fuel consumption. This model only considers diesel and residual fuel oil.
processDocumentation.modelingConstantsDescription: The percentage split in this process is from an industry website.
processDocumentation.completenessDescription:
TREATMENT OF MISSING ENVIRONMENTAL DATA: N/A

TREATMENT OF MISSING TECHNOSPHERE DATA: N/A

MASS BALANCE: Complete
processDocumentation.dataSelectionDescription: This dataset was sourced from the Maritime Page website which is a shipping industry resource.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The data source provided a fuel split of 80% for residual fuel oil and the remaining 20% is made up of multiple fuels, this model assumes that the entirety of the 20% consists of diesel fuel.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription:
BOUNDARY CONDITIONS: N/A

DATA COLLECTION: Data was collected from Maritime Page

UNCERTAINTY ESTIMATION: N/A
processDocumentation.dataCollectionDescription: The data collected is from a 2023 article.
processDocumentation.intendedApplication: The intended application for this process is for accounting purposes as described in Goal Situation C1 from the ILCD Handbook's Detailed Guidance. LCA studies with this intended application offer "purely descriptive documentation of the system under analysis (e.g., a product, sector or country), without being interested in any potential consequences on other parts of the economy.‚Äù The studies categorized under Goal Situation C1 do consider existing benefits outside the analyzed system such as recycling. These data are an update to a previously published dataset.

dataGenerator.name: Franklin Associates, A Division of ERG

dataDocumentor.name: Franklin Associates, A Division of ERG

dataSetOwner.name: Franklin Associates, A Division of ERG
